name: reboil
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to boil again, or to boil something again: Allow the water to reboil, and repeat this four times. As with all mustard sauces, the important thing is not to reboil it.
More examplesFewer examplesIf it doesn't thicken, you may want to reboil the mixture.Bring to the boil, add the cream, and re-boil.Is it okay to reboil marmalade that hasn't set?After the tea is made, fill and reboil the kettle.
